experience.label: Aesthetic Philosophy
experience.style_desc: My art direction is based on contrast, light, and shadow. I believe aesthetics is the first layer of any successful communication.
experience.fashion_desc1: Fashion is a powerful tool of expression. Through it, we communicate not only our style, but our vision of the world, our values, and our identity.
experience.fashion_desc2: In my work, I seek to translate this language in an authentic and impactful way, uniting refined aesthetics with a strategic narrative that resonates with the audience.
experience.quote: Aesthetics without strategy is just decoration. Strategy without aesthetics is invisible.
experience.quote_main: The construction of a project requires not only technical mastery, but also the sensitivity to give visibility to what is often imperceptible.

about.label: About me
about.title: WHO AM I?
about.p1: I am 25 years old and passionate about communication.
about.p2: Since childhood, I have developed a natural affinity for creating and directing projects for social media.
about.p3: An activity that deeply fascinates me.
about.p4: I constantly seek to improve my skills to bring ideas to life that unite

services.label: Specialties
services.item1_desc: Visual identity, layout, and creation of digital pieces with a focus on aesthetics and functionality.
services.item2_desc: Alignment of personal or brand image with communication goals, uniting style and purpose.
services.item3_desc: Creative fashion direction, selection of looks, and visual composition for editorials, campaigns, and brands.
services.item4_desc: Development of visual narratives for social media, uniting creativity and engagement strategy.

campaigns.label: Success Cases
campaigns.title: CAMPAIGNS
campaigns.subtitle: & ADVERTISING
campaigns.item1_desc: Choreographic and camera presence presentation for motion work.
campaigns.item2_desc: Advertising campaign focused on hair care and natural shine.
campaigns.item3_desc: Presence and lifestyle in collaboration with the global music platform.
campaigns.item4_desc: Institutional advertising focused on health and daily well-being, feat. Bia Gremion.
campaigns.item5_desc: Artistic distribution and performance for singer Murillo Zyes.

contact.label: Contact
contact.desc: Have a project in mind? Let's talk about how I can help transform your ideas into visual reality.
contact.status_desc: Currently accepting projects for creative direction, social media, and photography.
contact.whatsapp_msg: Hi Kaique, I saw your portfolio and would like to talk about a project!
